 Do one SPI transfer on a SD-card.

 Wait for card ready.
void deselect (void)
 Deselect the card and release SPI bus.
int select (void)
 Select the card and wait ready.
void power_on (void)
 Turn on SD card power DK doesn't support socket power control, only enable the SPI clock.
void power_off (void)
 Turn off SD card power DK doesn't support socket power control, only disable the SPI clock.
int rcvr_datablock (uint8_t *buff, uint32_t btr)
 Receive a data packet from MMC.
int xmit_datablock (const uint8_t *buff, uint8_t token)
 Send a data packet to MMC.
uint8_t send_cmd (uint8_t cmd, DWORD arg)
 Send a command packet to MMC.

Detailed Description

Micro SD card driver for the EFM32GG_DK3750 development kit.

This file provides the interface layer between the DK and the fat filesystem provided.

Author:
Energy Micro AS
Version:
1.0.0

Function Documentation

static uint8_t wait_ready ( void   )  [static]

Wait for card ready.

Returns:
0xff: card ready, other value: card not ready
